com.arjuna.CosRecovery.Transactions
Class TransactionRecoveryModule

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.arjuna.CosRecovery.Transactions.TransactionRecoveryModule
Direct Known Subclasses:
ServerTransactionRecoveryModule, TopLevelTransactionRecoveryModule
public abstract class TransactionRecoveryModule
extends java.lang.Object

This class is a plug-in module for the recovery manager. This is a generic class from which TopLevel and Server transaction recovery modules inherit. This class does not itself implement RecoveryModule (the plug-in definition) itself - this is left to the subclass.
